author: Louis Pasteur
message: Let me tell you the secret that has led me to my goal: my strength lies solely in my tenacity
title: Thought of the day

author: Rumi
message: Something opens our wings. Something makes boredom and hurt disappear. Someone fills the cup in front of us: We taste only sacredness.
title: Thought of the day

author: Sogyal Rinpoche
message: We must never forget that it is through our actions, words, and thoughts that we have a choice.
title: Thought of the day

author: Dennis Kimbro
message: We see things not as they are, but as we are. Our perception is shaped by our previous experiences.
title: Thought of the day
